1.Saliva is a great biological sensing fluid for diagnosis. 
 2.Hereby we will see how saliva is going to detect blood glucose level.
 3.This method is mainly focused on salivary resistance of a healthy and also a diabetic patient:before and after fasting,there are many other methods as well but this is a particular one basing on saliva.
 4.Saliva is a biological sensing element which is saliva based tannery solid waste so it can be used for sensing such as blood sugar level,hormone level,cancer biomarkers and etc.
